prompt_inputs.goal: Marathon training - high energy intake with carbohydrate loading for endurance performance

solution_criteria: Meal plan includes 4-5 meals/snacks with high carbohydrate content (60-65% of total calories)
Includes pre-training and post-training meal timing appropriate for marathon runner
Total daily calorie intake appropriate for 72kg endurance athlete (approximately 3000-3500 calories)
All meals are energy-dense and practical to prepare/consume within one day
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a high-endurance athlete (marathon runner) requiring high calorie intake and carbohydrate loading, focusing on whether the meal plan prioritizes energy density and includes appropriate timing around training

prompt_inputs.goal: Muscle gain during bulk phase with strength focus

solution_criteria: Meal plan distributes protein across at least 4 meals with 25-40g per meal
Includes calorie surplus recommendation (estimated 300-500 kcal above maintenance)
Contains at least one recovery-focused meal post-workout with carbs and protein
Plan is presented in compact, easy-to-scan format with clear meal structure
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a strength/power athlete (weightlifter) during a bulk phase, verifying the plan emphasizes protein distribution across meals and includes calorie-surplus recommendations with recovery-focused meals

prompt_inputs.goal: Create a 1-day meal plan for a boxer during cutting season that maintains lean muscle with a modest calorie deficit while supporting hydration and electrolyte balance
prompt_inputs.restrictions: No shellfish, vegetarian protein sources preferred where possible

solution_criteria: Meal plan creates a modest calorie deficit (10-15% below maintenance) appropriate for cutting while preserving muscle
Includes adequate protein distribution across meals (minimum 1.6g per kg bodyweight) to support lean muscle retention
Incorporates hydration and electrolyte considerations (water intake targets and electrolyte sources) relevant to weight-class athletes
Respects dietary restrictions and remains compact/concise (brief format suitable for quick reference)
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a weight-class athlete (boxer) during cutting season, assessing whether the meal plan maintains lean muscle while creating a modest calorie deficit and includes hydration/electrolyte considerations
